A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I have been watching Star Wars since I was a kid and I thought the worse Star Wars movies were the prequels. Well all that changed when I saw the Last Jedi. I was so excited when I went to go and see this movie and then I was just so disappointed. Spoilers Almost nothing made sense. Characters went against their nature. There were so many plot holes. Luke would never of tried to kill Kylo. Luke worked so hard to save his dad and now he would just turn his back on his way of thinking. I think not. The bombs on the ships would not of fallen down they would of stayed in place. They also added to many jokes. Luke milking that creature on the plant was unnecessary and stupid. The kid at the end of the movie just out of the blue using the force to grab a broom. Complete bull crap. It took Luke years to master the force and how to use it. This movie was a utter disappointment!
